Vaccination against COVID-19 is increasingly becoming a ticket of entry into restaurants, gyms and indoor performances or all of the above, if you're a New York City resident.

articles.title: The Lambda Variant: Everything Parents Need to Know About the COVID Mutation - Fatherly
articles.description: This isn't a complete unknown, people. It's worrisome. It's out there. We know how to stop it.
articles.content: Experts are only just now learning about the habits of the Delta variant, the main driver of the current COVID surge in the U.S.  It spreads rapidly, it could possibly be more deadly, and asymptomati… [+5443 chars]
